questions.text: List the customerName, city, state, and country for customers from the USA.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerName, city, state, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA'

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and buyPrice for products with a buy price greater than $100.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, buyPrice FROM products WHERE buyPrice > 100

questions.text: List the employeeNumber, firstName, lastName, and jobTitle for employees who are Sales Reps.
questions.solution_query: SELECT employeeNumber, firstName, lastName, jobTitle FROM employees WHERE jobTitle = 'Sales Rep'

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, productLine, and buyPrice for products in the 'Classic Cars' product line.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, productLine, buyPrice FROM products WHERE productLine = 'Classic Cars'

questions.text: List the customerNumber, customerName, and creditLimit for customers with a credit limit above $100,000.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerNumber, customerName, creditLimit FROM customers WHERE creditLimit > 100000

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and quantityInStock for products with less than 1000 units in stock.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, quantityInStock FROM products WHERE quantityInStock < 1000

questions.text: List the orderNumber, orderDate, and status for all orders that are 'On Hold'.
questions.solution_query: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'On Hold'

questions.text: List the customerName, country, and city for customers from Germany or France.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerName, country, city FROM customers WHERE country IN ('Germany', 'France')

questions.text: List the productCode and productName for products with 'BMW' in their name.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName FROM products WHERE productName REGEXP 'BMW'

questions.text: List the customerName, contactFirstName, and contactLastName for customers whose contact first name starts with 'J'.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerName, contactFirstName, contactLastName FROM customers WHERE contactFirstName REGEXP '^J'

questions.text: List the orderNumber and orderDate for orders placed between January 1, 2004, and June 30, 2004.
questions.solution_query: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate FROM orders WHERE orderDate BETWEEN '2004-01-01' AND '2004-06-30'

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and productScale for products with a vendor scale of 1:18.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, productScale FROM products WHERE productScale = '1:18'

questions.text: List the customerName, country, and state for customers without a state specified.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerName, country, state FROM customers WHERE state IS NULL

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and buyPrice for products with a price between $50 and $75.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, buyPrice FROM products WHERE buyPrice BETWEEN 50 AND 75

questions.text: List the productCode and productName for products that have either 'Ford' or 'Chevy' in their names.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName FROM products WHERE productName REGEXP 'Ford|Chevy'

questions.text: List the customerName and phone for customers with phone numbers that don't start with '+'.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerName, phone FROM customers WHERE phone REGEXP '^[^\+]'

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and productLine for products that are ships or planes.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, productLine FROM products WHERE productLine IN ('Ships', 'Planes')

questions.text: List the orderNumber, status, and comments for orders with comments mentioning 'delayed'.
questions.solution_query: SELECT orderNumber, status, comments FROM orders WHERE comments REGEXP 'delayed'

questions.text: List the customerName, city, and country for customers from cities starting with 'San'.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerName, city, country FROM customers WHERE city REGEXP '^San'

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, buyPrice, and MSRP for products with an MSRP at least twice their buy price.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, buyPrice, MSRP FROM products WHERE MSRP >= buyPrice * 2

questions.text: List the customerName, country, and creditLimit for customers with credit limits between $50,000 and $100,000 who are not from the USA.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerName, country, creditLimit FROM customers WHERE creditLimit BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 AND country != 'USA'

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and quantityInStock for products with either no units in stock or no units on order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, quantityInStock FROM products WHERE quantityInStock = 0 OR quantityOnOrder = 0

questions.text: List the orderNumber, orderDate, and status for orders placed in the last quarter of 2004.
questions.solution_query: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, status FROM orders WHERE orderDate BETWEEN '2004-10-01' AND '2004-12-31'
